reuters.title: FED SAYS IT BUYS 550 MLN DLRS OF BILLS FOR CUSTOMER, MAY THROUGH SEPT 24 MATURITY
reuters.body: Shr loss six cts vs loss 76 cts Net loss 343,748 vs loss 4.0 mln Revs 5.1 mln vs 4.8 mln Year Shr profit 12 cts vs loss 1.45 dlr Net profit 611,784 vs loss 7.7 mln Revs 21.6 mln vs 19.7 mln Reuter 
